name: I Can't Work Under These Conditions
name_original: I Can't Work Under These Conditions
description:
Created for the Github Game Off November 2022 using the cliché, "I Can't Work Under These Conditions!"
Complete simple puzzles (work) while periodically gaining more and more debuffs (conditions.) 7 icons will appear on the left of the screen, collect them all to win! Controlled with the mouse.
=== HUGE SENSITIVITY WARNING ===
Careful guys.
